resume.text:
Portfolio: https://guilherme.vercel.app/

Senior Software Engineer with 6 years of experience in web development, specializing in React, Next.js, Node.js and Java. Proven track record in front-end optimization and API design with successful projects for Banco do Brasil, CVC and SAP.

general.title: Who am I?
content: I'm Guilherme Almeida, a 24-year-old Software Engineer based in Curitiba, Brazil. I'm specialized in React + Next.js, Node.js + NestJS, Java, and UI/UX design, while also having experience with a wide range of other technologies.

I hold a Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering from the Federal University of Amazonas, as well as a Technical Degree in Informatics with an emphasis on Software Engineering, totaling 8 years of academic experience and 6 years of work experience.
At the moment, I'm focused on DevOps and back-end development, though my core expertise lies in front-end engineering, UI/UX design, and mobile development.
general.summary: Senior Software Engineer with 6 years of experience in web development, specializing in React, Next.js, Node.js and Java. Proven track record in front-end optimization and API design with successful projects for Banco do Brasil, CVC and SAP.

content.content: While my focus lies on web development, I’m also deeply interested in adjacent fields such as machine learning, data mining, and embedded systems. My passion for DIY culture has led me to explore other branches of engineering, including mechatronics. Additionally, I’m considering pursuing a second degree in Sound Engineering to further expand my multidisciplinary skill set.

Outside of tech, I’m a passionate enthusiast of niche and alternative cultures. I'm an avid fan of RPGs, gothic subculture and cyberpunk literature. I also have a deep appreciation for experimental art, ranging from psychedelic cinema to noise music, which continuously inspires my creative approach to problem-solving and design. My artistic interests often intersect with my technical work, allowing me to bring a unique perspective to both fields.
I'm currently working on several side projects, such as a <0>post-rock project</0> and an <1>illustration project</1>. I also make <2>some wallpapers</2> for Wallpaper Engine.

jobs.name: Senior Full Stack Engineer
bullets: Reduced technical debt and fixed CSP issues

content: Maintained a legacy codebase for <0>SAP</0> written in JavaScript and ASP. Responsibilities include addressing technical debt by resolving CSP violations, improving accessibility and performance, updating dependencies, and implementing new unit tests to ensure code reliability and maintainability.

jobs.name: Full Stack Engineer
bullets: Built Web3 apps with Python (Django) and React
Integrated blockchains, crypto payments, and cloud services
Led UI/UX design for seamless user experiences

content: Full Stack Engineer at a Miami-based company specializing in Web3 technologies, including NFTs, crypto, and blockchain. Focused on ESG initiatives and rewards programs for clients such as <0>Banco BV</0> and <1>PelXP</1>.

Worked on multiple client projects, primarily maintaining and enhancing the <0>page builder</0>. Responsibilities included front-end development with React, UI/UX design, and back-end development with Django.

jobs.name: Front-end developer
bullets: Built CVC’s bus ticket platforms, Rodofácil and Rodoviário Exclusivo
Used TypeScript, React, Jest, and Docker
Participated in war room before launch to ensure a smooth release

content: Front-end developer collaborating with developers, designers, and managers to modernize businesses. Clients include fintech <0>Banco Inter</0> and travel company <1>CVC</1>.
As a front-end developer, I worked on CVC's bus ticket platforms, Rodofácil and Rodoviário Exclusivo, using TypeScript, React, and Jest. Both projects are available on <0>projects section</0>.

jobs.name: Full Stack developer
bullets: Helped develop Banco do Brasil's investments page
Worked on front-end using React, Next.js, and CI/CD pipelines
Contributed to UI/UX design for a better user experience

content: Full Stack developer collaborating with developers, designers, and product managers to deliver high-end digital solutions. Key clients include <0>Banco do Brasil</0>, <1>Bradesco</1>, and <2>Itaú</2>.
My main project at this company was Banco do Brasil's <0>investments page</0>, where I primarily worked as a front-end developer. Tools used include TypeScript, React, Jest and Docker.

jobs.name: Full Stack developer
bullets: Developed on-demand software with React, Wordpress, PHP, Node, Java, and Python
Designed full-stack apps from scratch, handling UI/UX and deployment (FTP)
Automated tasks and performed web scraping using Python and Scrapy

content: Full Stack Developer in the I.T. department of the Regional Council of Engineering and Agronomy of Amazonas, responsible for developing and maintaining systems, including a CRM, document management, and event management platforms.
Also served as an I.T. support technician, maintaining computers, servers, and printers, and as a designer, developing the council's visual identity and website.
